title: Five Nights At Freddy’s: Help Wanted Free Download (NON-VR)
description:
Get FNAF Help Wanted NON VR PC game for free instantly and play pre-installed on SteamRiP
Five Nights at Freddy’s: Help Wanted is a collection of classic and original mini-games set in the Five Nights universe. Survive terrifying encounters with your favorite killer animatronics in a collection of new and classic FIVE NIGHTS AT FREDDY’S experiences. “Where fantasy and fun come to life”
A VR headset is NOT required to play. This download is the NON-VR version of the game.
There is a total of 40 playable minigames in the base game with three of them being featured in the demo. After completing the mini-games, players can replay them again in a nightmare mode of some sorts, which cranks up the difficulty and distraction in every game. Upon fully completing the game, players are treated to an end game which expands upon the lore of the games
